Authorization

EIDITH logon credentials

Database

ed_db_download

Download EIDITH data to local storage

ed_db_status

Get the status of the locally stored EIDITH database

ed_db_updates

Check the online EIDITH database for updates since your last download.

ed_db_export

Export the local EIDITH database to a file

EIDITH data

ed_metadata ed_taxagroups

EIDITH table metadata

ed_tables_conn

Connecting eidith tables

ed_table_ ed_table ed_events ed_animals ed_specimens ed_tests ed_viruses ed_testspecimen
